__TOC__

This talk was more a workshop so there are no formal notes. It walked through the process of creating a simple Debian package. BenjaminMakoHill gave the talk and used notes which he has online at his website here:

* http://mako.yukidoke.org/projects/sa_debian/

The talk walked through the actual creation of a package and the modification of an existing package.
